title: Good Dog, Bad Mountain: A Memoir About a Dog, a Young Man, and a Hike on the Appalachian Trail (The Appalachian Trail Series
description: This a true story about hiking the Southern section of the Appalachian Trail...one paw at a time. The author has written several travel and hiking guides to the South that are published with Falcon Guides and Hachette Book Group.Mowgli (an eccentric, lovable, and somewhat destructive German Shepherd) leads the way. Hiking buddies Diego and Bexley sign up for the adventure, and the pack of pals discover the boundless beauty of the Appalachian Mountains, the dangers of venturing into unpredictable forests, and the quirkiness of the unforgettable rural towns found along America's greatest wilderness path. It's all just a fun walk in the woods until they take an unexpected turn in the trail.
author: Joshua Kinser
